Additional resourcesÔÉÅ

The list af additional resources for eDNA based (biomonitoring) surveys

  • Jerney, Jacqueline, et al. DNA metabarcoding: Guidelines to monitor phytoplankton diversity and distribution in marine and brackish waters. Nordic Council of Ministers, 2023.

    • aquatic eDNA for phytoplankton biomonitoring


  • Bruce, Kat, et al. A practical guide to DNA-based methods for biodiversity assessment. Pensoft Advanced Books, 2021.

    • aquatic eDNA

    • bulk invertebrates

    • benthic periphytic diatoms

    • sediments/soils
